name: encounterType
description: Type of clinical encounter. Clinical cohorts: use 'HIV Primary Care' for in-person visits and 'Telemedicine' codes for remote visits. Interval cohorts: use 'Interview visit' codes.
example: HIV Primary Care, Telemedicine – Video, Telemedicine – Phone, Interview visit – in-person

name: encounterInsType1
description: Primary Insurance Type for Visit at time of encounter. Valid codes: 1=Medicaid (or Medi-Cal for CA), 2=Medicare, 3=Medicaid+Medicare, 4=Other US public, 5=Veteran's Administration Medical Benefits, 6=Canadian publicly-funded provincial health care plan, 7=Private or commercial health insurance, 8=Self pay/none (including Ryan White/ADAP), 9=Worker's Comp, 99=Unknown. You may submit either the numeric or text value.
example: Medicare, Medicaid, 2, 7, Private or commercial health insurance

name: encounterInsType2
